title: Knowledge Acquisition Strategies in Virtual Reality-Based Language Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and educational administration experience
context.additional_context: Experimental research-based training for managers/leaders with advanced language proficiency, comparing learning effectiveness between HMD-VR and desktop-VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain how immersion levels (high-end/low-end) in VR environments affect cognitive load and procedural knowledge acquisition during language learning
Learners can quantitatively measure the effectiveness of VR-based language learning through pre- and post-assessment designs
Learners can evaluate the correlation between learner experience (PQ) and academic achievement through eye-tracking and physiological data analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
